summary: This mod retextures all of the Elven blade weapons (Gratsword, Sword, and Dagger) with cutsom made high-resolution 4K textures.
descriptionHtml:
The elven weapons always have too much gold. Especially in Skyrim. This mod, which includes custom made high-resolution 4K textures, aims to fix that. I saw no reason to do the axes or warhammer.

FAQ:
Q: What is 4K?
A: 4K refers to texture size. Default Skyrim is 512x512 textures. 4K is 4096x4096.

Q: I can has...(insert outrageous demand here)?
A: No. I will not be uploading 2K versions. If you want them, downscale them yourself. Nor will I be taking custom orders.

Q: My framerate went down after installing.
A: I cannot help you with that. I know that the Unofficial Patches have a huge hit on performance.

Q: I installed but the textures haven't changed?
A: The textures (.dds) go in <skyrim dir>/Data/Textures/Weapons/Elven. All you have to do is extract and copy.

Q: Why not make it NMM compatible?
A: That is an incredibly unnecessary amount of work for a simple texture mod. If you are too lazy to manually install a mod, Khajiit has no words for you. Khajiit does not welcome you or your coin.

I do not give any permission to anybody for my work. 4K textures take an incredible  amount of time and effort, and I work too hard to have someone take them and upload them somewhere else as their own.

Meshes and additional SkyRealism Shiny textures by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2071659]MTichenor[/url]

NOTICE: Mods like this exist already. I was unaware of this. If you like, you can take a look and compare texture quality:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4251/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3730/?
As far as copy/stealing accusations go, my textures are created from scratch, and have no base. If you truly believe that my textures have been stolen, let me and a staff member on the Nexus know.
My mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71430/?]Better Elven Blades[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71096/?]Clandestine Overlook[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71406/?]Not Another Dawnbreaker Mod[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71447/?]Nine Planes of Oblivion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71522/?]Ebony Katana Standalone[/url]
